input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Fette Filter - Elite 469918 Refrigerator Air Filter Compatible for Kenmore. (2-Pack)

Item specifications:
Easy to intsall. Replace every 6 months
15 times more effective than baking soda in reducing orders
Less costly than the OEM without compromising quality.
Compatible with Kenmore Elite 469918 Refrigerator Air Filter
High Quality Fette Filter Brand Product
Carbon-based, long-lasting charcoal filter
Replace every 6 months
Packaging may vary


Product description:
input_text.Response A: This Fette Filter Elite 469918 air filter is compatible with Kenmore refrigerators. It is a high-quality carbon-based air filter that is long-lasting and reduces unwanted orders. It is less costly than the OEM filter and is easy to install. Replace every 6 months for best results. Comes in a pack of 2 filters.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
